item.title: Chris add a quote by Margaret Wheatley
item.description: "It's not differences that divide us. It's our judgments about each other that do." -- Margaret Wheatley

item.title: Chris add a quote by David Mechanic
item.description: "...people who struggle against tyranny are more psychologically healthy than those who are docile and simply conform to current ways of thinking...there is much evidence that some of the most creative people in history were driven individuals who were terribly unhappy and out of sync with their social context. Creativity itself is a form of deviant behavior that requires individuals to break from usual assumptions and understandings in developing entirely new perspectives and approaches." -- David Mechanic
